physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cyanosis of lips, clubbing of nails; lung and heart examination within normal limits; no hepatomegaly, ascites, or pedal edema.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Continuous home oxygen therapy at 4 L/min; dyspnea during daily activities.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Oxygen saturation lower than previously recorded; still experiencing dyspnea without improvement after starting antibiotic therapy.
